ReleaseNote:
- Included AfxHookSource 2.115.21 (2022-10-04T12:50Z).

## AfxHookSource 1.115.2 (2022-10-04T12:50Z)
- Added mirv_streams stream drawZ dithered and made it default for depth streams. This greatly reduces the perceived color banding for 8 bit streams. Thanks to https://www.youtube.com/c/RikkiLove for suggesting to copy this ReShade feature and helping with testing.
- Fixed potential threading issues / crashes in mirv_streams when editing or deleting streams while they are in preview or capture.
- Renamed mirv_streams stream drawZMode values logE, pyramidalLogE to log, pyramidalLog (old values are silently mapped to new values) and made the logarithm effect meaningful.

---

To turn on the new depth map method when using a custom config use: `mirv_streams edit depth drawZ dithered` (default on template)
If you want to use the old one: `mirv_streams edit depth drawZ gray`

Rikki recommends to use ProRes instead of x264 to preserve the depth / colors better and gave these example ffmpeg settings for HLAE:
```
mirv_streams settings add ffmpeg PRORES "-vsync 1 -c:v prores_ks -profile:v 3 -c:a pcm_s16le {QUOTE}{AFX_STREAM_PATH}_prores.mov{QUOTE}";                        //prores (12 bit)
mirv_streams settings add ffmpeg PRORESXQ "-vsync 1 -c:v prores_ks -profile:v 5 -c:a pcm_s16le {QUOTE}{AFX_STREAM_PATH}_proresxq.mov{QUOTE}";                    //proresxq (12-16 bit, alpha support)
```
